resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/191959685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>191959685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4762</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Water Cycle</string>
            <string language="es">El ciclo del agua</string>
            <string language="ga">An Timthriall Uisce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wasser-Schleife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cycle de l'Eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ciclo Da Água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Ciclo Dell'Acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος ύδατος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Clear explanation of the water cycle, including the processes of evaporation, condensation and precipitation. Also provides details of some experiments.</string>
            <string language="es">Sencilla explicación del ciclo del agua, se incluyen los procesos de evaporación, condensación y precipitación. También se dan detalles de algunos experimentos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Míniú soiléir ar an timthriall uisce, lena n-áirítear na próisis ghalaithe, chomhdhlúthaithe agus frasaíochta. Tugann sé sonraí roinnt turgnaimh freisin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">SESE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Environmental Care</string>
            <string language="es">Cuidados medioambientales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Cúram Timpeallachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freie Erklärung der Wasserschleife, 
einschließlich die Prozesse der Verdampfung, der Kondensation und des
Niederschlags. Stellt auch Details einiger Experimente zur 
Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explication claire du cycle de l'eau, y compris 
les processus de l'évaporation, de la condensation et de la 
précipitation. Fournit en outre des détails de quelques 
expériences.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explanação desobstruída do ciclo da água, 
including os processos da evaporação, da condensação e da 
precipitação. Fornece também detalhes de algumas 
experiências.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione libera del ciclo dell'acqua, compreso
i processi di evaporazione, di condensazione e di precipitazione. 
Egualmente fornisce i particolari di alcuni esperimenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σαφής εξήγηση του κύκλου ύδατος, συμπεριλαμβανομένων 
των διαδικασιών της εξάτμισης, της συμπύκνωσης και της πτώσης. 
Επίσης παρέχει τις λεπτομέρειες μερικών πειραμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaobacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soin Environnemental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cuidado Ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cura Ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβαλλοντική προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
